verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Pangoni Bethlehemu,
kazaliwa Mwana wa Mungu. x2
Tuimbe wote aleluya,
aleluya, aleluya, aleluya,
ni furaha Bwana kazaliwa.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Kazaliwa mtoto Masiha wetu,
twende Bethlehemu
tukamwabudu.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Kazaliwa mtoto ndiye
mfalme wetu,
aja na ufalme begani mwake.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Tulimsubiri sana huyo
mfalme wetu,
sasa ameshuka kutukomboa.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Malaika Mbinguni wanamsifu
Bwana,
nao wanaimba nyimbo
zashangwe.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Nasi pia twendeni
huko Bethlehemu,
twende na zawadi tukamtolee.
